title: Survey for my essay.

replies.body:
Not sure if a strawpoll is the best to do a survey for an essay because you don't know the demographic of people who voted.

I voted anyway :P
replies.body_tagged:
Not sure if a strawpoll is the best to do a survey for an essay because you don't know the demographic of people who voted.

I voted anyway :P

replies.body:
I'd rather have a quick survey than one that people will take a few minutes on.

And also I'd only have to say "XX% of people asked said XX gender is whatever" so I didnt choose to make a bunch of questions.
